item.title: Research
item.description: Below are links to select publications and working papers. Full CV here. “Explaining Denials: Adverse Action Codes and Machine Learning in Credit Decisions” with George Krivorotov. (link) “Decomposing Joint Distributions via Reweighting Functions: An Application to Intergenerational Economic Mobility” with Alicia Rosburg, Econometric Reviews (2020), 39(6). (link) “Decomposing Economic Mobility Transition Matrices” with Alicia Rosburg, Journal of Applied Econometrics (2018), 33. (link) “Changing Roles of Ability and Education in U.S. Intergenerational Mobility” with Alicai Rosburg, Economic Inquiry (2017), 55, 1.
